dcterms:description: MovieLens is one of the most widely used datasets in the recommendation domain, containing usersâ€™ ratings towards movies as well as other attributes, e.g., gender, age, and occupation. ML-100K is the version containing 100 thousand ratings.
dcterms:title: MovieLens 100K (ML-100K)

dcterms:creator: Ruining He
Julian McAuley
dcterms:description: A version of MovieLens dataset that has 1 million ratings, used for collaborative filtering and recommendation tasks.
dcterms:title: MovieLens 1M (ML-1M)

dcterms:creator: Alessandro B Melchiorre
Navid Rekabsaz

dcterms:description: This dataset collected more than 2 billion listening events, which is used for music retrieval and recommendation tasks. It also contains user attributes including gender and country.
dcterms:title: LFM-2B

dcterms:description: KuaiSAR is a unified search and recommendation dataset containing genuine user behavior logs collected from the short-video mobile app, Kuaishou. It includes two attributes of users, namely Feat1 and Feat2.
dcterms:title: KuaiSAR-small
